scripts.build: next build renderer && next export renderer
scripts.rebuild-sqlite3-win: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.7-win32-x64 && node-gyp node-gyp rebuild --target=1.7.8 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.7-win32-x64
